price: 60. Mabe ekozala epai ya bapengwi o mokolo oyo balakaki bango.
arabic: فَوَيۡلٞ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِن يَوۡمِهِمُ ٱلَّذِي يُوعَدُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: fawaylun lilladhīna kafarū min yawmihimu alladhī yūʿadūna
